pullRequest.body:
If `F` is a fiber functor, then the stabilizers of the `Aut F`-action on the fibers of all Galois objects form a neighborhood basis of the topology of `Aut F`.

---

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message

<!-- By Dependent Issues (Action) - DO NOT REMOVE -->

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10888863690/job/30214251644)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10888863690/job/30214252181)

To slightly increase readability, I suggest starting the conclusion on a new line
```suggestion
lemma exists_set_ker_evaluation_subset_of_isOpen
    {H : Set (Aut F)} (hone : 1 ∈ H) (h : IsOpen H) :
    ∃ (I : Set C) (_ : Fintype I), (∀ X ∈ I, IsConnected X) ∧
      (∀ σ : Aut F, (∀ X : I, σ.hom.app X = 𝟙 (F.obj X)) → σ ∈ H) := by
```
Minor nitpick: I slightly prefer `h1` over `hone`, since "hone" is also a verb.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(CategorTheory/Galois): stabilizers form a neighborhood basis of the identity
